text: @NYGovCuomo New Yorkers are responsible for many of the Covid-19 issues in other states because New Yorkers fled Covid-19 infested NY for other States with ZERO regard for the infections they might cause. You did nothing to stop this irresponsible and selfish conduct so no bragging for NY!
